name: Simply Minesweeper
synopsis: Simply Minesweeper gives you exactly what you want: pure Minesweeper on your Nintendo DSi system! Minesweeper is a classic puzzle game where you have to defuse the bombs scattered around the board. Each tile will indicate how many bombs are hidden around it. Your first move is always a gamble, but once you get started you must analyze the numbers shown to find out where the bombs are concealed. The simple game design and easy, intuitive controls make it a game that the whole family can enjoy. The game has 50 puzzles in each level to provide hours of gameplay fun.
